other_tests.findings: Diagnosis of Burkholderia cepacia pneumonia based on examination of biopsy specimen.
Revealed gram-positive, modified acid-fast bacillus-positive filamentous organisms consistent with Nocardia species.
Showed fungal elements, culture grew Paecilomyces lilacinus.
Administered 5 days a week for 3 consecutive weeks.
Positive result with CD4 T lymphocyte count of 109 cells/mm3 and virus burden of 324,000 copies/mL at admission.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After treatment, virus load fell to <10,000 copies/mL and CD4 count rose to 170 cells/mm3.

other_tests.findings: Pulmonary and hepatic lesions were improved.
